Experience.title: Database Programming Intern
points: Solely developed student awards database system for the Financial Aid Office using MS Access, VBA, SQL and Excel
Designed VBA application to parse database entries and generate written award information posted on awards website
Created a front-end interface using MS Access Forms and MySQL that allows for making reports and generating awards
Wrote scripts in VBA to process thousands of lines of multiple excel files resulting in greater office productivity/efficiency
Wrote Python scripts to process and graph college enrollment information completing a month’s task in one week

Experience.title: Dragon Boat Team Executive

Led team meetings regarding seasonal recruitment strategies, budget allocation and practice schedules
